name: Inferno (itch) (ethoang, bigworm44, aibolano)
description:
You are an adventurer who stumbled across a dilapidated dungeon. The floors are infested with demons, and will break over time. Make your way to the final floor and defeat the boss to win!

Game created by Alberto Bolanos, Emily Hoang, and Franklin Chen. Play in fullscreen for a better experience.

Credits for art and sound assets can be found in the game.
